Package com.example.omninventory

package com.example.omninventory
  • Class
    Description
    ApplyTagsActivity
    Activity for applying tags to one or more items.
    DetailsActivity
    Activity for viewing the contents of all of an InventoryItem's fields.
    EditActivity
    Activity for editing an item's fields.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    GetInventoryItemHandler
    Interface for a class that can receive InventoryItem data from Firebase.
    InventoryItem
    Class representing an item stored in the inventory.
    InventoryItemAdapter
    A custom ArrayAdapter that works with InventoryItem objects.
    InventoryRepository
    Encapsulate behaviours related to Firestore, going from Firestore document to InventoryItem and vice-versa, etc.
    InventoryUpdateHandler
    Interface for a class that should run some method when the whole contents of a User's inventory may be updated (specifically, MainActivity, which holds a ListView showing all items).
    ItemDate
    In different places of the code a date (year, month, and day) may be represented as a Date, a Calendar, and as a String.
    ItemValue
    A standard representation of the 'Value' field of an InventoryItem.
    LoginActivity
    Login screen of the app.
    MainActivity
    Main screen of the app.
    ManageTagsActivity
    Activity for viewing and managing the master taglist.
    SignupActivity
    Signup screen of the app.
    SortByDate
    Implements comparing an InventoryItem by Date (an ItemDate).
    SortByDescription
    Implements comparing an InventoryItem by Description (a String).
    SortByMake
    Implements comparing an InventoryItem by Make (a String).
    SortByValue
    Implements comparing an InventoryItem by estimated value (an ItemValue).
    SortFilterActivity
    Activity used for user to select how to sort/filter items.
    Tag
    Stores tag name and list of items tagged with that tag.
    TagAdapter
    A custom ArrayAdapter that works with Tag objects.
    TestAddItemActivity
    Tests for adding an item.
    TestDeleteItemActivity
    Tests for deleting an item.
    TestEditItemActivity
    Tests for editing an item.
    TestFilterItemActivity
    Tests for filtering list of items.
    TestItems
    Test class that sets up default database InventoryItem data for testing.
    TestLoginActivity
    Tests for logging into the app.
    TestProfileActivity
    Tests for the user Profile screen (not yet implemented).
    TestSortItemActivity
    Tests for sorting the list of items.
    TestTagActivity
    Tests for the Tags functionality.
    User
    Class representing a user of the app.
    Utils
    A class containing utility functions used in the app, currently for password hashing and validation.
    ValidationResultCallback
    For validating user's login credentials without running into logical issues due to Firebase's asynchronous operations.
    ValueTextWatcher
    Custom TextWatcher that reformats any input entered into an EditText intended to hold currency values, resulting in text that is a valid string representation of an ItemValue (see ItemValue class).
